meanings.definition: The area or region from which milk is supplied to a particular dairy processing facility.
meanings.sent1: The milksheds around here provide fresh milk to our dairy.
meanings.sent2: The milksheds in the valley ensure our dairy has enough milk.
meanings.sent3: The milksheds decided to throw a party for the dairy processing facility.
meanings.sent4: The milksheds stretched out like a blanket covering the dairy plant.
meanings.sent5: The green pastures of the milksheds were a paradise for the dairy cows.

meanings.definition: The act of collecting or gathering milk from various farms within a specific geographic area.
meanings.sent1: Our job involves visiting different milksheds to collect milk for the dairy.
meanings.sent2: The milksheds make it convenient for us to gather milk from nearby farms.
meanings.sent3: The milksheds decided to have a race to see who could collect the most milk.
meanings.sent4: The milksheds were like eager hands reaching out for the milk from the farms.
meanings.sent5: The milksheds hummed with activity as farmers brought their milk for collection.

meanings.definition: The process of distributing milk from farms to dairy plants for processing.
meanings.sent1: The milksheds ensure smooth transportation of milk to the dairy plants.
meanings.sent2: We rely on the milksheds to deliver the farm milk to the dairy factory.
meanings.sent3: The milksheds organized a parade to celebrate their role in milk distribution.
meanings.sent4: The milksheds acted as the veins carrying lifeblood to the dairy processing units.
meanings.sent5: The milksheds buzzed with activity as trucks carried milk to the dairy plants.
